::Spitfire::

She snuck past the group and went into the ship.  She was looking for 
the armory.  She had her gun damaged in the last battle and needed a 
replacement.  She turned to look around and almost ran into Optimus.
"Oh, pardon me. Could you direct me to the armory, I need to get a 
new weapon to help in the fight outside."
She turned her arm so her Maximal symbol showed on her shoulder.
"Forgive my rudeness, but, who are you?"
